response.original_title: Kaugere: A Place Where Nobody Enters
response.overview: Kaugere in Port Moresby, PNG. Rugby coach Albert Muri is no stranger to crime and the raskol gangs that tore his family apart. His eldest son was killed by the police and his second son is serving life in prison. Dia, his youngest son remains his last bea- con of hope helping him training the local rugby team, channeling criminal minds into sporting heroes. As Desmond is pardoned and gets out of prison, the question arises: what future is there in a settlement that more closely resembles a slum and where everyone lacks everything?
response.title: Kaugere: A Place Where Nobody Enters
